36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37
38KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION krb5_ssize_t KRB5_LIB_CALL
39_krb5_put_int(void *buffer, uint64_t value, size_t size)
40{
41 unsigned char *p = buffer;
42 int i;
43 for (i = size - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
44 p[i] = value & 0xff;
45 value >>= 8;
46 }
47 return size;
48}
49
50KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION krb5_ssize_t KRB5_LIB_CALL
51_krb5_get_int64(void *buffer, uint64_t *value, size_t size)
52{
53 unsigned char *p = buffer;
54 unsigned long v = 0;
55 size_t i;
56 for (i = 0; i < size; i++)
57 v = (v << 8) + p[i];
58 *value = v;
59 return size;
60}
61
62KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION krb5_ssize_t KRB5_LIB_CALL
63_krb5_get_int(void *buffer, unsigned long *value, size_t size)
64{
65 uint64_t v64;
66 krb5_ssize_t bytes = _krb5_get_int64(buffer, &v64, size);
67 *value = v64;
68 return bytes;
69}
70
